translation.author: Rock;contact@emotion-tech.com;Hugo FLYE
translation.t:
Micro Delta Rework Plugin v1.0
written by Hugo Flye from eMotion Tech 
www.emotion-tech.com
Auto-calibration failed, please check your probe and retry
Bed calibration complete. Click "next" to calibration the maximum height
Remove your probe and place a sheet of paper in the center of your bed
Move your hotend until the hotend touch the paper and maintain it
Calibration completed. You can now print!
Calibration in progress... Calibration will be avorted after this operation.
Please double check that your sensor is correctly plugged and tightly screwed, press "Next" to continue.
Please double check that your sensor is correctly removed from your printer, press "Next" to continue
